title: LF Diamond 1+ sub ADC to fly to Jakarta for IESF tournament (flights + accom paid for)
body:
Hello Summoners,

There is an opportunity for a sub ADC to play in a tournament in Jakarta, Indonesia. 
Your flights + accomodation will be paid for + you will get a share in the prize winnings. Unfortunately this is not open to OCS or OPL players and must be an Australian citizen.
Please add: Aura Ksubi in game if you are interested, or know anyone who is interested. 

This is a once in a lifetime opportunity so get in quick!

replies.body: Thank you for your application, we will review it shortly!
can I play in my smurf b5 account? trust me I am challenger {{champion:32}} and just looking for friends {{summoner:3}} {{summoner:31}}
RIP, Will be reviewing all applicants on Monday 29/8. Happy climbing!
